metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13233 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In arch/x86/lib/insn-eval.c in the Linux kernel before 5.1.9, there is ause-after-free for access to an LDT entry because of a race conditionbetween modify_ldt() and a #BR exception for an MPX bounds violation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
